chinese: 君子陽陽、左執簧、右招我由房。其樂只且。
english: My husband looks full of satisfaction.In his left hand he holds his reed-organ,And with his right he calls me to the room.Oh the joy!

chinese: 君子陶陶、左執翿、右招我由敖。其樂只且。
english: My husband looks delighted.In his left hand he holds his screen of feathers,And with his right he calls me to the stage.Oh the joy!
